title: Podcast-Integrated Design for Remote Mathematics Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental mathematical concepts and problem-solving skills
context.additional_context: A course strengthening practical competencies through project-based assessments in a smartphone-centric limited technological environment

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three real-world applications of mathematical concepts through podcast content
Learners can correct over 80% of project errors by utilizing podcast feedback provided twice weekly.
Learners can systematically document the process of solving math problems in five or more stages through asynchronous access in a mobile environment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
